answers.answer: Slightly big for the weeks he is. I am 34 weeks measuring 35cm they say I'm normal.
Some women that have gestational diabetes tend to carry larger babies plus it's just an estimation.
My son was 9lb2oz when he was born. He was my first baby and I did not have gestational diabetes. Some babies are just big :)

They aren't always accurate when they measure baby. They told me my first baby was over 7 lbs at 37 weeks and he was only 6.5 lbs at birth at 40 weeks. Those are only estimates. I wouldn't worry too much.

That doesn't sound too big. How tall and widesetare you? If your a small person then that may be big for you. My family has a tendency to be tall with broad hips. My son was 8Ib 6 oz and that was small for my family. My nephews we're both almost 9 and my brother was 11.

question: Is this normal?? His dad is tall && was 9 pounds as a new born, just a little curious, plus i have gestational diabeties, they say i measure at 34 weeks
title: my baby is BIG 5lbs14oz at 32w+6d
